mapper.sql: ${prefix}id as id, ${prefix}cmpy_name as cmpy_name, ${prefix}uni_social_code as uni_social_code, ${prefix}legal_reptive as legal_reptive, ${prefix}cmpy_phone as cmpy_phone, ${prefix}cmpy_phone_history as cmpy_phone_history, ${prefix}cmpy_province as cmpy_province, ${prefix}cmpy_addr as cmpy_addr, ${prefix}history_cmpy_addr as history_cmpy_addr, ${prefix}annu_rept_phone as annu_rept_phone, ${prefix}annu_rept_addr as annu_rept_addr, ${prefix}favorite_city_update as favorite_city_update, ${prefix}favorite_type_update as favorite_type_update, ${prefix}data_status as data_status, ${prefix}data_quality as data_quality, ${prefix}update_time as update_time, ${prefix}update_by as update_by, ${prefix}create_time as create_time, ${prefix}create_by as create_by, ${prefix}sync_time as sync_time

${prefix}id as ${alias}id, ${prefix}item_type as ${alias}item_type, ${prefix}item_sub_type as ${alias}item_sub_type, ${prefix}trd_type as ${alias}trd_type, ${prefix}info_title as ${alias}info_title, ${prefix}pack_count as ${alias}pack_count, ${prefix}info_id as ${alias}info_id, ${prefix}info_source as ${alias}info_source, ${prefix}info_url as ${alias}info_url, ${prefix}debt_province as ${alias}debt_province, ${prefix}trd_province as ${alias}trd_province, ${prefix}debt_city as ${alias}debt_city, ${prefix}trd_amount_orig as ${alias}trd_amount_orig, ${prefix}trd_amount as ${alias}trd_amount, ${prefix}total_debt_amount as ${alias}total_debt_amount, ${prefix}trd_status as ${alias}trd_status, ${prefix}trd_date as ${alias}trd_date, ${prefix}pub_date as ${alias}pub_date, ${prefix}update_time as ${alias}update_time, ${prefix}notes as ${alias}notes, ${prefix}buyer_type as ${alias}buyer_type, ${prefix}buyer_id as ${alias}buyer_id, ${prefix}seller_type as ${alias}seller_type, ${prefix}seller_id as ${alias}seller_id, ${prefix}seller_name as ${alias}seller_name, ${prefix}trd_contactor_name as ${alias}trd_contactor_name, ${prefix}trd_contactor_addr as ${alias}trd_contactor_addr, ${prefix}data_status as ${alias}data_status, ${prefix}data_quality as ${alias}data_quality
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from CUST_TRD_CMPY ctc left join CUST_TRD_INFO cti on cti.buyer_id = ctc.id and cti.buyer_type = 2
where ${whereClause}

select count(tmp.id) from(
select ctc.id as id, count(ctc.id)
from CUST_TRD_CMPY ctc inner join CUST_TRD_INFO cti on cti.buyer_id = ctc.id and cti.buyer_type = 2
${filterByClause}
group by ctc.id ) as tmp

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from CUST_TRD_CMPY ctc left join CUST_TRD_INFO cti on ctc.id = cti.buyer_id and cti.buyer_type = 2
where ${whereClause}

select count(tmp.id) from(
select ctc.id as id, count(ctc.id)
from CUST_TRD_CMPY ctc left join CUST_TRD_INFO cti on ctc.id = cti.buyer_id and cti.buyer_type = 2
${filterByClause}
group by ctc.id ) as tmp
select ctc.cmpy_name, count(ctc.cmpy_name) as cnt from CUST_TRD_CMPY ctc group by ctc.cmpy_name having cnt > 1;
